titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Account books collection, 1760-1936 [bulk 1800-1900]

repository.corpname: The New York Public Library. Manuscripts and Archives Division.

address.addressline: Fifth Avenue at 42nd Street, New York, NY 10018-2788

did.abstract: Collection consists of account books primarily maintained by businesses and individuals in New York City and New York State, but also including some from other states, and several from overseas. Account books are of a business, household and personal nature.

scopecontent.p: Collection consists of account books primarily maintained by businesses and individuals in New York City and New York State, but also including some from other states, and several from overseas. Account books are of a business, household and personal nature.

prefercite.p: Account books collection, Manuscripts and Archives Division, The New York Public Library

altformavail.p: Selected account books available on microfilm; New York Public Library
